text: Joan Chen (born April 26, 1961) is a Chinese-American actress, movie director and movie producer. She became famous for her performance in the Academy Award-winning 1987 movie The Last Emperor. She also had a role in the 1990-1991 television series Twin Peaks. Chen played Mrs. Yee in the 2007 award-winning erotic thriller Lust, Caution. Chen was born in Shanghai, China. ==References== Category:American movie producers Category:American movie directors Category:American movie actors Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese movie producers Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Joan Chen
